Class Shape

java.lang.Object
  Shape

public abstract class Shape
extends java.lang.Object

The super class for different shapes. Stores the common aspects of all shapes.

Version:
2012.11.29
Author:

Constructor for objects of class Shape

Parameters:
color - The color of the shape.
xPosition - The initial x position.
yPosition - The initial y position.
Method Detail

changeColor

public void changeColor(java.lang.String newColor)
Change the color. Valid colors are "red", "yellow", "blue", "green", "magenta" and "black".

Draw the shape with current specifications on screen.

Make this shape invisible. If it was already invisible, do nothing.

Make this shape visible. If it was already visible, do nothing.
